text: 12.37 Jon 13.4 Pen ne adɨkɨd apɨl nɨgɨnɨgab, kɨli nɨg yenɨgabal ak, kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak. Nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, bɨawl anɨb ak ne ke, chech ne ak lɨpɨgek apek wulep wulep pagɨl, sɨbnag pak tɨbɨkɨnɨgab agak. Tɨbɨkɨl kɨlop agek, am tap lɨñɨbal tep ak am besɨg kuskus gel, ne ke kɨlop tap ñɨŋeb ak dam ñɨnɨgab agak.
